text: When you die, you appear in a cinema with a number of other people who look like you. You find out that they are your previous reincarnations, and soon you all begin watching your next life on the big screen.

When you die, you appear in a cinema with a number of other people who look like you. You find out that they are your previous reincarnations, and soon you all begin watching your next life on the big screen. I am still in shock from the fact that I was run over by a bus but am now standing in a theater with rows and rows of my doubles. I glanced up at the screen to see my head pop out of my mother as she was giving birth. I recoiled at the sight. I was then told by one of my doubles to sit down because I was blocking the screen. I did so and tried to gather myself the best I could and watch the movie of my life.

When you die, you appear in a cinema with a number of other people who look like you. You find out that they are your previous reincarnations, and soon you all begin watching your next life on the big screen. I am still in shock from the fact that I was run over by a bus but am now standing in a theater with rows and rows of my doubles. I glanced up at the screen to see my head pop out of my mother as she was giving birth. I recoiled at the sight. I was then told by one of my doubles to sit down because I was blocking the screen. I did so and tried to gather myself the best I could and watch the movie of my life. 

I could see everything that was happening on screen, but from a first-person perspective.

When you die, you appear in a cinema with a number of other people who look like you. You find out that they are your previous reincarnations, and soon you all begin watching your next life on the big screen. I am still in shock from the fact that I was run over by a bus but am now standing in a theater with rows and rows of my doubles. I glanced up at the screen to see my head pop out of my mother as she was giving birth. I recoiled at the sight. I was then told by one of my doubles to sit down because I was blocking the screen. I did so and tried to gather myself the best I could and watch the movie of my life. 
I could see everything that was happening on screen, but from a first-person perspective. It was surreal. I was watching myself grow up in fast forward but still able to keep up as if it was in real time. I saw my first birthday and then before I knew it was in school meeting friends that would remain with me for the rest of my life.

I glanced up at the screen to see my head pop out of my mother as she was giving birth. I recoiled at the sight. I was then told by one of my doubles to sit down because I was blocking the screen. I did so and tried to gather myself the best I could and watch the movie of my life. 
I could see everything that was happening on screen, but from a first-person perspective. It was surreal. I was watching myself grow up in fast forward but still able to keep up as if it was in real time. I saw my first birthday and then before I knew it was in school meeting friends that would remain with me for the rest of my life. I saw my first kiss and my first heartbreak.

When you die, you appear in a cinema with a number of other people who look like you. You find out that they are your previous reincarnations, and soon you all begin watching your next life on the big screen. I am still in shock from the fact that I was run over by a bus but am now standing in a theater with rows and rows of my doubles. I glanced up at the screen to see my head pop out of my mother as she was giving birth. I recoiled at the sight. I was then told by one of my doubles to sit down because I was blocking the screen. I did so and tried to gather myself the best I could and watch the movie of my life. 
I could see everything that was happening on screen, but from a first-person perspective. It was surreal. I was watching myself grow up in fast forward but still able to keep up as if it was in real time. I saw my first birthday and then before I knew it was in school meeting friends that would remain with me for the rest of my life. I saw my first kiss and my first heartbreak. I saw my graduation from high school and then from college. I was so caught up in the film that I nearly forgot how I got there. There was a break in the film around age 21 before things started to get a little crazy in my life and we all went to the lobby for intermission. 
There I talked with some of my doubles to try and figure out what in the heck was going on. I was then handed a pamphlet. One of my doubles mentioned that I was the last one to enter and did not get one with the rest of us. I looked it over carefully and the clear objective of this experience was to live a life of an average american at the turn of the 21st century. I was in simulation the whole time learning what it was like to live in the past during such a transitional time in human history. This was actually just one of many simulations that you take part of in the future of education. I am now to reflect on my most previous life, learn what I can from so I can apply what I have learned in the future where I am originally from.
